tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is a thorough professional. She never compromise over the dental health of her patients. I have had several treatments at her clinic with great success rate. I have undergone placement of 6caps with minimal cutting of my natural teeth (pain-free). Thank you so much Dr Nidhi for restoring my teeth. Happy me!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We met Dr. Nidhi during our 3rd visit to the clinic.. She is  good at her work.. Professional and she listens to u very carefully.. She will explain everything  before  doing any procedure... She gave me the cap in my front tooth in such a reasonable price... I like my smile now...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Thanks to Dr. NIGHT that my mother can eat anything now she wanted... She is very good in taking care of patients..  She listens carefully.. Very hard working must say.. My mother has a great smile now.. Thank u all the staff and doctors of DENTLIFE..  It was a nice experience with u docs..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Got your reference from our colony neighborhood. People praise about you being one of the best available and affordable dentist in the vicinity. That's how I dropped in and feeling equally satisfied with the treatment obtained. Dental treatment given by Dr Nidhi Walia is worth praising as my main concern was my appearance and which got changed totally after caps given by Dr Nidhi. Extremely useful treatment provided to me, i am able to chew properly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: i got artificial teeth from dr.nidhi. first dr.vidhi greeted me and checked my teeth so nicely. then she gave my case to dr.nidhi, her sister. dr.nidhi is very nice in her work. she has given me all my teeth back. thank you

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: very nice team of doctors. totally satisfied. thank god that such doctors exists who just think of their patients comfortableness *** ******* ******* ********** ******* keep up the good work

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: i consulted many dentists in the area but everybody either said no for my denture or told me a very high fees for denture.. but now i got a new set of teeth for eating.Respect for Dentists at Dentlife dental care centre. Good clinic, nice and understanding doctors. *** ***** ******** ****** **** *** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: While Dr.vidhi did my rcts ,Dr.Nidhi took my cap measurements. Fully satisfied with the treatment done at their clinic. Thanks

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: You feel in safe hands. The doctors and their small team are very kind and efficient. They can do almost every dental treatment. Their guidance is matter of factually.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have my wedding in july. I had a big gap in between my 4 teeth. I didn't have time for braces so she suggested me to go for zirconia crowns. Now my teeth looks pretty well. Thank you so much.  Even my husband loved it.
